mod.name: Elementarium
mod.description: An alternate act 2 themed around elementals and golems.

cards.name: Earth-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 4 Plated Armor.
Gain 3 Thorns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Earth-blessed Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 5 Plated Armor.
Gain 4 Thorns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fire-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Gain 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fire-blessed Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Gain 2 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gilded Defend
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Gilded Defend+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Gilded Essence
cards.description: Gain 2 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Gilded Essence+
cards.description: Gain 3 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Gilded Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 6 Plated Armor.
Gain 20 Gold.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Gilded Form+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 8 Plated Armor.
Gain 20 Gold.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Gilded Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Gilded Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Ice-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Gain 1 Buffer.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ice-blessed Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Gain 2 Artifact.
Gain 1 Buffer.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Void-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 2 times.
Enemy loses 2 Strength.
Gain 1 Blur.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Void-blessed Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
Enemy loses 3 Strength.
Gain 1 Blur.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wind-blessed Blade
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
Gain 4 Block 2 times.
Apply 2 Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wind-blessed Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage 3 times.
Gain 6 Block 2 times.
Apply 3 Weak.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tar
cards.description:
Gain 1 Weak at end of turn.
Ethereal.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sticky Tar
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Remove one Sticky Tar from deck after winning an elite fight.

relics.name: Elementarium Trophy
relics.description: A trophy of your victory in the Elementarium.

relics.name: Flickering Lantern
relics.description: At the start of your third turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: It flickers with unearthly light, renewing itself and then fading.

relics.name: Golden Mirage
relics.description: The first time you shuffle your deck each combat, gain 1 Intangible.

relics.name: Golem's Heart
relics.description: The first card you play each combat is played twice.

relics.name: Hatchling Phoenix
relics.description: Whenever you add a 1-cost card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

relics.name: Hunter's Bracer
relics.description: Start each elite combat with 2 Thorns and Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: A protective bracer made out of the sharp scales of some creature.

relics.name: Hunter's Elixir
relics.description: Start each elite combat with 1 Artifact and 4 Regen.
relics.flavorText: A fortifying elixir of unknown provenance.

relics.name: Hunter's Sling
relics.description: Start each elite combat with 1 Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: A well-balanced sling crafted from hide and sinew.

relics.name: Radiant Idol
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, heal 6 HP.
relics.flavorText: The idol now radiates intense heat.
